title: The Coming Crypto Apocalypse
content: The future of money and payments will feature gradual evolution, not the revolution that crypto-grifters promised. Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies’ latest plunge further underscores the highly volatile nature of this pseudo-asset class; one only hopes that policymakers will wake up to the risks before it’s too late.
creator: Nouriel Roubini
sourceDescription: Project Syndicate - The World’s Opinion Page

title: Financialization Won’t Improve Global Health
content: Rather than address the weaknesses of the grant-based approach to global health financing, donors want to scrap it in favor of instruments that mobilize more private capital. But this new architecture distorts the risk landscape in ways that socialize losses, while privatizing profits and control.
creator: Walter O. Ochieng
sourceDescription: Project Syndicate - The World’s Opinion Page

title: Markets Are Shrugging Off Uncertainty
content: Despite all the geopolitical and policy volatility that has marked the start of 2026, most key metrics of financial-market uncertainty have been immune to the state of the world. Either political sentiment and media narratives are overblown, or markets are whistling past the graveyard.
creator: Dambisa Moyo
sourceDescription: Project Syndicate - The World’s Opinion Page

title: The ICEmen Killeth
content: So long as ICE agents, in their zeal to fulfill deportation quotas, targeted Hispanics or people of color, most white Americans did not fear for their safety, even if they deplored such tactics. But the murder by federal officers of two white US citizens at close range changes that, and the public backlash won’t fade soon.
creator: Ian Buruma
sourceDescription: Project Syndicate - The World’s Opinion Page

title: America’s Mad Emperor
content: Every "logical" explanation that has been applied to US President Donald Trump's unhinged behavior over the years has proven inadequate. At this point, detractors and former supporters alike are recognizing that Trump's words and deeds can be explained by only one thing: mental derangement.
creator: Jeffrey Frankel
sourceDescription: Project Syndicate - The World’s Opinion Page

title: Penicillin and American Power
content: Technological leadership is often framed as a matter of singular breakthroughs rather than institutional capacity. But the rapid development of penicillin during World War II shows that coordinated public leadership, strong research institutions, and a dynamic private sector produce results no other innovation system can achieve.
creator: Paolo Surico
sourceDescription: Project Syndicate - The World’s Opinion Page

title: Our Tariff-Era Dollar, Your Problem
content: The greenback’s effective depreciation on the trade side and its continued stability on the financial side will likely not last forever, at which point the US economy could be forced into a painful rebalancing. But until that day arrives, non-US economies should not assume that a weaker dollar will deliver the usual relief.
creator: Qiyuan Xu
sourceDescription: Project Syndicate - The World’s Opinion Page

title: The Impact of Trump’s Tariffs on Latin America
content: The Latin American and Caribbean region has weathered the increase in US import tariffs relatively well, although certain countries and sectors have been more affected than others. But the more fraught global trade environment has underscored the need to deepen ties with regional and extra-regional partners.
creator: Eugenia Andreasen
sourceDescription: Project Syndicate - The World’s Opinion Page

title: The Middle-Power Dilemma
content: Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney's call for the rest of the world to join forces in managing a new era of economic and geopolitical turmoil will certainly resonate with national leaders worldwide. But the path to unity among middle powers is fraught, because interests within such a broad grouping rarely align.
creator: Eswar Prasad
sourceDescription: Project Syndicate - The World’s Opinion Page

title: When Misinformation Kills
content: Disregard for scientific evidence by opponents of vaccination, led by US Secretary of Health and Human Services Robert F. Kennedy Jr., is producing exactly the harms experts predicted: disease outbreaks, preventable deaths, and the reversal of decades of progress in public health. The consequences could become truly catastrophic.
creator: Peter Singer
sourceDescription: Project Syndicate - The World’s Opinion Page

title: A United Front to Tame Trump
content: US President Donald Trump’s foreign policy rests on contempt for longstanding allies and a belief that force alone matters in international affairs. The path forward, as Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney argued in Davos, lies in midsize democracies banding together to preserve what remains of the postwar order.
creator: Chris Patten
sourceDescription: Project Syndicate - The World’s Opinion Page

title: Trump Has Killed American Deterrence
content: Deterrence fails not only when threats to act or retaliate lack credibility, but when the absence of credibility tempts adversaries into recklessness. A leader like Donald Trump, who cannot commit and is disloyal to even his closest allies, is not merely ineffective; he is dangerous because he tempts adversaries to act recklessly.
creator: Stephen Holmes
sourceDescription: Project Syndicate - The World’s Opinion Page

title: Trump’s War Against the States
content: The killing of two US citizens by federal immigration officers marks a grim turning point in President Donald Trump’s efforts to militarize domestic law enforcement. The events in Minneapolis underscore the dangers of unchecked executive power, as weakened courts and a compliant Congress leave states exposed to federal coercion.
creator: Steven Simon
sourceDescription: Project Syndicate - The World’s Opinion Page

title: Trump’s American Titanic
content: Donald Trump’s bullying of allies and fallacious arguments have put the US on a collision course with disaster, winning only rare plaudits, notably from the likes of Vladimir Putin. The rest of the world is reorienting itself away from the United States, making an orderly dash for the life rafts that will carry them to dry land together.
creator: Harold James
sourceDescription: Project Syndicate - The World’s Opinion Page

title: The Promise of a Middle-Power Alliance
content: In his landmark Davos speech, Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney urged the world’s middle powers to band together, or else risk being dominated by the United States and China. To succeed, they must strengthen trade ties, develop autonomous supply chains, and implement meaningful institutional reforms.
creator: Moreno Bertoldi
sourceDescription: Project Syndicate - The World’s Opinion Page

title: Is Affluence a Barrier to Living Well?
content: In a new book, Brink Lindsey argues that wealthy liberal democracies have essentially solved the problem of material provision and are now experiencing a nervous breakdown. But humans have always struggled with the challenge of living well and wisely.
creator: Michael R. Strain
sourceDescription: Project Syndicate - The World’s Opinion Page

title: What Would a Bardella Presidency Mean For France?
content: National Rally’s Jordan Bardella has emerged as the frontrunner in France’s presidential race, confronting the European Union with the prospect of a far-right Euroskeptic in the Elysée. Yet Bardella appears less intent on dismantling the EU than on exploiting its existing arrangements, which already work to France’s advantage.
creator: Brigitte Granville
sourceDescription: Project Syndicate - The World’s Opinion Page

title: Trump’s Waterloo?
content: US President Donald Trump’s second term has been defined by unilateralism, militarism, and lawlessness, pushing constitutional checks and balances to their limits. His intervention in Venezuela could be the point at which his governing style collides with reality, alienating his base and accelerating his political decline.
creator: Harold Hongju Koh
sourceDescription: Project Syndicate - The World’s Opinion Page

title: New World Order or Bust
content: With Donald Trump gleefully destroying what remains of the old postwar international order, the world is a mess. But the answer is not to defend institutions that have lost their effectiveness and legitimacy; it is to create something better, starting with AI, where we can build from the ground up.
creator: Margrethe Vestager
sourceDescription: Project Syndicate - The World’s Opinion Page

title: Trump Has Condemned Europe to Success
content: To survive in a dangerous new world, the European Union, established as an antidote to power politics, must contradict the very principle on which it was founded by becoming a superpower in its own right. Fortunately, it already has all the assets it needs in order to do so.
creator: Sławomir Sierakowski
sourceDescription: Project Syndicate - The World’s Opinion Page
